summary: Test module that verifies the correctness and robustness of Numba‑accelerated spectrogram augmentation kernels used in automatic speech recognition, covering gradient computation, large‑batch handling, and edge‑case scenarios such as missing or extreme frequency and time masks.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the performance of high‑speed SpecAugment implementations to ensure reliable training and inference of ASR models, preventing regressions in functionality, numerical stability, and scalability.
